summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith In-Shower Style Fixer is an extreme strong hold styling gel that provides long-lasting definition, humidity protection and shine for all curls.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor long-lasting, weather resistant results that keeps curls defined. A no-flake gel for curls with no build-up.Ultra-strong hold gel keeps curls locked in place even in high humidityKeeps curls perfectly shaped without flaking or buildupEnhances shine and reduces frizzMade with Apricot Kernel, Resurrection Flower and Avocado OilFeaturesThis powerful styling gel keeps curls perfectly shaped without flaking or build-up, enhances shine, and helps reduce frizz, giving you bold, defined results that last.BEST FOR: Medium to coarse hairFORMAT: GelHOLD LEVEL:10- Extreme holdColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643518How To UseApply to wet hair. Use a dime-sized amount per section. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse. Scrunch once dry to break the cast.IngredientsWater (Aqua/Eau), Polyquaternium-69, Glycerin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Selaginella Lepidophylla Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Leaf Extract, Piper Nigrum (Black Pepper) Seed Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Carapa Guaianensis (Andiroba) Seed Oil, Sodium Gluconate, Carbomer, Butylene Glycol, Aminomethyl Propanol, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Fragrance (Parfum), Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Limonene, Linalool, Pinene, Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Use a dime-sized amount per section. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse. Scrunch once dry to break the cast.
